metadata.title: CVE-2020-6571 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in Omnibox in Google Chrome prior to85.0.4183.83 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via IDNhomographs via a crafted domain name.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
